name: Grilled Bread Topped With Celery Heart And Goat Cheese
keywords: aged goat cheese, baguette, celery heart, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, sichuan peppercorns, appetizer
recipeIngredient: 6 ounces aged goat cheese, cut across into very thin slices

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a grill or broiler. Brush the bread on both sides with the olive oil. Grill or broil until browned and crisp, about 2 1/2 minutes per side. Rub the garlic clove over each bread slice. Top with slices of celery and goat cheese. Sprinkle with the cracked peppercorns and serve.
